title: Note Taker
description: A simple webapp to write and save notes

title: Dinner & Drink
description: Find recipe & wine pairings based on your dietary needs

title: Employee Tracker
description: A command-line application that interacts with a MySQL database to keep track of departments, roles and employees within an organization.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A minimalist webapp that displays current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast for any city you search.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Plan your work day, hour by hour, through the web.

title: Just Another Text Editor
description: An online text editor that follows PWA standards to download and run as an offline application.
